message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,200,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm definitely interested in the product, but $1,200,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $800,000?

Hi Bob, I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit higher than you're comfortable with, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,000,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value it will bring to your business.
